name: WILSON BLADE TEAM V2 BLACK
description:
Why buy the Wilson Blade Team V2 Black Padel Racket?
It’s a padel racket with a medium-high balance and a very wide contact point. This helps to deliver a control style, with powerful shots and great precision.
The hole is distributed in a heart structure. This makes it light and provides very firm swing movements, without interference.
What type of player is the Wilson Blade Team V2 Black padel racket for?
It’s for adult women and men who play padel at advanced levels and require a racket that gives them agility and a lot of power.
Design and colours
It is designed in a teardrop shape. The frame is matte black. The faces are dull dark grey. The racket bears the "BLADE" logo in small white typeface in the lower part of the racket edges. A very large, classic Wilson "W" appears in the centre of the faces, in a fluorescent green colour.
Technical characteristics of the Wilson Blade Team V2 Black padel racket

The frame is made of very solid fibreglass. This ensures a long useful life, even with the impacts that come with very intense and frequent use.
The faces have a non-textured finish that facilitates off-centre shots without penalties.
The core is made of EVA very soft density rubber. This provides high recovery capacity.
The smooth finish on the racket encourages the execution of ball effects that are very difficult for opponents to counter.
The handle incorporates a grip with exclusive Sublime technology to provide a permanent feeling of comfort, free from the effects of sweating.

name: ADIDAS METALBONE HRD+
description: Adidas Metalbone HRD+, oversize diamond padel racket, 2024 collection. Adidas Metalbone HRD+, this Adidas padel racket model is from the 2024 collection. It is a padel racket with an oversize diamond-shaped body, perfect for professional level players. That is why it is the official padel racket of Ale Galán. With the oversize diamond body and high balance plays with power. It has more contact surface. It shoots with power and aggressiveness against your opponent to score the decisive point.  Weight & Balance System technology exclusive to Adidas. Add or remove customizable weights to the padel racket to change the weight of the racket and the direction of its balance to modify your playing technique. Padel racket for players with power technique. The frame is made of carbon fiber of excellent strength and durability. The faces are made with Carbon Aluminized 2 to 1. Aluminized carbon fiber intertwined 2 to 1 that generates a hard surface and little flexible to hit with great power. The core is made of EVA High Memory rubber. This high density rubber allows you to play with balls that go at high speed. It also feels like you hit with maximum power. Get incredible spin with  Spin Blade Decal and Smart Holes Curve technologies. A rough surface finish increases the amount of spin and the feeling of control over the ball. And get spin on all shots thanks to the die-cut layout. A solid and strong padel racket A strong and solid padel racket with  Octogonal Structure and Structural Reinforcement technology. An octagonal carbon tubular and perimeter reinforcement makes this padel racket resistant to twisting and has superior durability. And with Metalbone Protector Tape, a custom-designed 3M adhesive protector to protect the padel racket while you play. It has an impeccable and minimalist design with the body in black, the logo on the planes, bridge and grip in white and the Galán signature in red.

name: ADIDAS METALBONE 3.3 2024
description: Adidas Metalbone 3.3, Ale Galán's official 2024 padel racket. Adidas Metalbone 3.3, official padel racket of the professional player Ale Galán. Padel racket model of the year 2024. Padel racket designed for high performance professional players. This padel racket has a Diamond Oversize shape. A power padel racket with a wider hitting surface. This padel racket has been designed with the exclusive Adidas Weight & Balance System technology. You can remove and put some screws in the heart of the padel racket that raise or lower the balance of this by changing its weight. You can vary the weight of the padel racket up to 12 grams. Aluminized carbon faces The frame of the padel racket has been made with carbon fiber and the faces with Carbon Aluminazed 2 to 1. Resistant and rigid materials with which to work with power on the court. The core is soft as it has been made with EVA Soft Performance rubber. A low density EVA rubber that allows to play with trajectory balls with less speed. It allows a comfortable game and return the ball with rebound. Feel how you give the best effects to the ball thanks to the technology of the faces. The finish of the flats is rough from the Spin Blade Decal technology. The dies follow a curvature based on Smart Holes Curve technology that makes it easier to give spin to the ball. Increased durability and strength Superior rigidity thanks to the octagonal tubular designed with  Octogonal Structure technology. And greater durability by being resistant to twisting thanks to Structural Reinforcement technology. Designed with Metalbone Protector Tape to protect the padel racket from wear and tear. And an imposing style with an all-black body with subtle details in deep red.

name: NOX AT10 GENIUS 18K AGUSTIN TAPIA 2024
description:
Nox AT10 Genius 18K 2024 by Agustín Tapia, power and precision
The Nox AT10 Genius 18K 2024 by Agustín Tapia is the jewel of the new Nox padel rackets collection. This balanced padel racket offers the player a perfect combination of power and control. With a teardrop shape, it incorporates new materials and technologies that provide a more solid and comfortable shot, greater stability and superior performance on the court.
What type of player is the new Tapia racket recommended for?
The Nox AT10 Luxury Genius 18K 2024 has been designed for advanced level players. If you are looking for a manageable padel racket that allows you to hit the ball with precision without sacrificing power, this is the racket for you. In addition, it has a rough sandy surface that provides optimal grip and allows for more spin on your shots. Feel what Agustin Tapia feels on the court with the new Nox AT10 Genius 18K!
Technologies in the AT10 Luxury Genius 18K 2024 by Nox
This padel racket has been manufactured with a 100% carbon frame that gives it great stability and resistance. It also incorporates the DCS Dynamic Composit Structure technology, which guarantees great durability and better performance. Likewise, the new EOS Flap system of lateral perforations distributes the weight better, making it more aerodynamic and manageable.
Its Aluminised Carbon 18K faces, consistent but light, provide an optimal ball output, achieving precise and powerful shots without compromising stability. Inside, we find a Multilayer MLD Black EVA core that offers an exceptional feel. This combination of materials gives the Nox AT10 Genius 18K 2024 a medium hardness, allowing a more precise response that facilitates controlling the ball during the shot.
Among its technologies, it incorporates the Pulse System which, together with the Nox Custom Grip technology, improves the grip and reduces the vibrations produced during the stroke, providing greater comfort during play. It also features the SmartStrap system, which allows you to replace easily the racket's safety cord without having to manipulate the lower cap: more hygienic, safer and more customisable.
Enjoy Agustín Tapia's new padel racket now!
The Nox AT10 Luxury Genius 18K has returned this season renewed to the courts. More manoeuvrable than its predecessor and with a generous sweet spot, it offers advanced padel players great control to return even the most difficult balls. In addition, the combination of its core with the 18K Carbon Alum fibre of its faces, provides exceptional power in the smash.
The result is an innovative, stable and comfortable padel racket that combines the best of technology and design to offer an unbeatable playing experience. What are you waiting for to enjoy it?

name: BULLPADEL VERTEX 04 HYBRID
description: Bullpadel Vertex 04 Hybrid, outstanding power and control Designed for adult padel players of expert level, the Bullpadel Vertex 04 Hybrid is the ideal choice if you are looking for a versatile, high quality and high performance padel racket that allows you to hit the ball with power and control. Due to its hybrid shape and low balance, this model balances perfectly between control and power, in addition to providing incredible sensations in both defense and attack. It has a weight of 365 to 375 grams and a 38mm profile. Increased stiffness for solid shots In order to achieve exceptional stiffness and strength without having to give up good handling and lightness, the planes of this model are composed of Xtend Carbon 12K, which uses biaxially interwoven carbon ribbons. In addition, the surface has a rough finish that allows the athlete to hit the balls with spin, as it favors the grip. On the other hand, the inner core uses Multieva rubber, which consists of two densities (a more compact outer one and a low density inner one) to better adapt to the needs of each stroke. The CarbonTube frame, made of 100% bi-directional interwoven carbon fiber, ensures balanced control and power. Vibration reduction In terms of technology, it incorporates the Vibradrive grip mounting system which, thanks to an elastic rubber insert, effectively absorbs vibrations after impact, especially on off-center hits. Likewise, the CURVAKTIV and AIR POWER systems have been combined in the frame to increase the durability, resistance and rigidity of the padel racket, while better distributing vibrations for greater comfort when hitting. It also features the CustomWeight weight plate system, which makes it possible to modify the balance of the padel racket depending on the needs of each player.

name: BULLPADEL VERTEX 04
description: Bullpadel Vertex 04, full of power and effect shots. Designed for professional or advanced padel players, the new Bullpadel Vertex 04 will give you unprecedented power with little effort. It is the padel racket chosen by Juan Tello for the 2024 season. Its diamond mold and high balance make it an ideal model if you are looking for maximum power in your attacking plays. Your shots will be lethal. Its weight is between 365 and 375 grams, so it offers good maneuverability. CarboTube frame for more power and control Thanks to its Vertex core, power and weight are evenly distributed for solid volleys and power-packed shots, while reducing twisting and vibration. The core is made of a dual density Multiveva rubber, which allows the player to adapt to the type of stroke, responding effectively to slower balls with great control and with excellent power on fast strokes. The composition of the planes is based on Xtend Carbon 12K, a few intertwined carbon fibers that provides rigidity and strength, while reducing weight as it is a material up to 30% lighter than ordinary carbon. Combines the AIR POWER and the CURVAKTIV The grip incorporates the Hesacore, a very innovative grip that generates a larger contact surface, which reduces effort, injuries and the transmission of vibrations. In the grip it incorporates the Grip Custom Weight system, which allows the modification of the balance and weight of the padel racket. On the faces we find the TOPSPIN technology, a rough finish that facilitates the grip of the ball to the surface to hit the ball with much more effect. It also includes Vibradrive technology, a mounting system that inserts a piece of very elastic rubber that is responsible for absorbing vibrations and improve the overall feel of the game, especially in off-center hits.

name: WILSON BLADE TEAM V2
description:
Why buy the Wilson Blade Team V2 padel racket?
It is a padel racket with a medium-high balance and a very extensive contact point. Both factors give expert players versatility on the court.
The holes are distributed in a concentric structure on most of the faces’ surface area. This makes it light and very easy to use, to obtain forceful and well-placed attacks and returns.
What type of player is the Wilson Blade Team V2 padel racket for?
It is for intermediate adult players who require an appropriate racket for a versatile style.
Design and colours
It is designed in a teardrop shape. The frame is matte black and the faces have a fluorescent green tone. The classic Wilson logo appears in the centre of the faces, with a large ‘W’ in matte black.
Technical characteristics of the Wilson Blade Team V2 padel racket

The fibreglass frame features FibreGlass Wave technology to provide great strength, completely resistant to very intense use.
The faces include a rough finish in the centre to favour highly efficient lobs.
The core integrates EVA soft density rubber, which guarantees a very comfortable touch and immediate recovery.
The finish contains  Sharp Hole technology to ensure optimal ball contact and the execution of powerful and very accurate serves.
The handle contains a grip with micro-perforations, which eliminate moisture and promote a very firm grip.

name: ADIDAS CROSS IT LIGHT
description: Adidas Cross It Light 2024, firm, comfortable and controlled stroke. Designed to offer excellent performance on court to those padel players of advanced or professional level, the Adidas Cross It Light provides exceptional control in each stroke. It is the official padel racket of Martita Ortega for the 2024 season. If we focus on its shape, it is worth noting its round shape with low balance because, by distributing the weight towards the foot, it gives the player a lot of control and extra protection against arm injuries. Its sweet spot is wide and located in the center. Strength and durability This Adidas 2024 padel racket has a core composed of  EVA Soft Energy rubber, a medium density foam that provides a fast ball exit and exceptional power. In addition, the planes have been manufactured with Carbon Aluminized 24K, a material that, thanks to its low flexibility, guarantees greater power and speed in the most aggressive shots. The frame is made of 50% carbon fiber, which increases strength, lightness and durability. More spin on your shots The Adidas Cross IT Lightalso integrateshigh-performance technologies to increase the power, spin and durability of the padel racket. The Dynamic Air Flow technology promotes air flow through the core, which makes the padel racket easier to handle, while the Power Extra Grip generates greater inertia and slightly shifts the sweet spot upwards for more power. On the other hand, we find the Spin Blade Mold system, which consists of a 3D embossed roughness located in the mold to increase power and grip while hitting the ball with more spin. In order to increase the durability of the padel racket and extend its useful life, it incorporates the Structural Reinforcement technology, which consists of perimeter reinforcements that generate greater resistance to high torsion.

name: BULLPADEL VERTEX 04 COMFORT
description: Bullpadel Vertex 04 Comfort, controlled power The new Bullpadel Vertex 04 Comfort is the padel racket chosen by the professional player Martin Di Nenno to face the 2024 season. It is a model that grants outstanding power and control to advanced or professional padel players. It has a diamond shape with a high balance, so your shots will be loaded with maximum power without any loss of control. Its weight is between 360 and 370 grams and its profile is 38mm. Greater control when hitting In terms of materials, the CarbonTube frame is made of 100% bi-directional interlocking carbon fiber, which combines the CURVAKTIV system with AIR POWER to better resist twisting and evenly transmit the stresses throughout the padel racket. In addition, the surface is made with Fibrix HybridFiber, a bi-directional composite of X-Glass and Carbon that, combined with an elastic resin, provides additional elasticity and flex to the core. The inner core, in turn, is made of a dual density Multieva rubber, an inner layer of a lower density and a very compact outer layer. This results in a versatile padel racket that adapts perfectly to both slow strokes and fast balls. Exceptional comfort at all times On the other hand, it is worth mentioning the Vertex core, which distributes the weight in such a way that it minimizes torsion, eliminates vibrations and increases rigidity. You will be able to make solid and powerful volleys. Also, on the faces of this padel racket we find the TOPSPIN technology, a roughness that favors the hit with effect thanks to a greater grip. It also has the Custom Weight Grip, located on the handle, which allows you to modify the weight and balance of the padel racket to suit the needs of each player.

name: ADIDAS METALBONE CTRL 3.3 2024
description: Adidas Metalbone CTRL 3.3, Lorena Rufo's 2024 professional padel racket. Adidas Metalbone CTRL 3.3, racket of the professional padel player Lorena Rufo. Padel racket model from the 2024 collection. This padel racket is aimed at high performance players with a professional mastery of the technique of the sport. With its round body and centered balance it is perfect for control players. With its Weigth & Balance System you can modify and vary the weight of the padel racket. In the heart of this you can add or remove some screws with which you can add up to 12 grams more weight to your padel racket. Carbon fiber on the faces and EVA Soft rubber core. This padel racket has been made with carbon fiber in the frame and Carbon Aluminazed 2 to 1 in the faces. Carbon fiber is a very resistant and hard material. The faces of this padel racket have a rigid and resistant touch to be able to hit with power. The core is made of EVA Soft Performance rubber. A low density rubber in contrast to the high hardness faces. This type of rubber provides more output to the ball while a comfortable feeling in the blow. The flats are finished with Spin Blade Decal, a rough surface that grips the ball for better control and handling of spin. And the dies have been designed with Smart Hole Curve whose design also allows better access and handling of the effects of the ball when playing. A resistant and strong padel racket to play padel. It is a rigid, solid and resistant padel racket thanks to the  Octogonal Structure and Structural Reinforcement technologies. An octagonal tubular allows for a stronger body and a perimeter reinforcement allows the padel racket to better resist twisting during the game. A padel racket with a sporty design with black faces and the brand logo in white. The frame and bridge of the padel racket are blue and the cuff is white.

name: BABOLAT AIR VIPER 2024
description:
Babolat Air Viper 2024, control the game
The Babolat Air Viper 2024 arrives, a hybrid-shaped padel racket with an even balance. This padel racket is part of the Babolat 2024 collection, and the brand defines it as a racket for aerial attacking players. This padel racket allows you to play with great speed. Made to play with power, spin and unmatched comfort.
New Air Viper, manageable power
Within the Air line of Babolat padel racquets, the Viper version of the 2024 allows you to play comfortably with power and spin. The faces of the padel racket are made of 16K carbon, an interwoven carbon fabric with a very hard feel that allows you to hit those powerful shots. That is why the design and materials used is recommended forpadel players with a marked technique in the attack and power in the blows.
Technologies of the new Babolat Air Viper 2024

X EVA core: this core is composed of 3 layers of EVA. Each of them has a different density. The innermost layer is softer and the middle and outer layers are harder. It allows you to play explosive and comfortable strokes.
3D Spin+ Rough Finish: The Babolat Air Viper has a 3D rough embossed finish on the planes that allows you to play balls with more spin and greater control.
Holes Pattern System: Babolat improves the transition of power and precision of the blows by adapting the die-cutting in size and distribution according to the head of the padel racket.
Vibrabsorb System Powered By SMAC Technology: elastomers are integrated with the carbon fiber in the heart and fist of the padel racket. This achieves optimal absorption of vibrations produced by the blows.
Smart Buttcap: this system allows you to remove and change the safety strap easily and quickly. You can wash it or change it for another one.

Play now with the Babolat Air Viper 2024 available at Pādel Nuestro.
In short, the new Air Viper 2024 from Babolat arrives to stay with padel players looking for high performance with a high quality padel racket in design and materials. This padel racket gives you performance on the court that allows you to play with comfort, precision and power.
Play like the great professionals who rely on the French brand Babolat to give the best of themselves on the court.

name: BULLPADEL VERTEX 03 2023
description:
Bullpadel Vertex 03 2023, deploys a powerful game
The Bullpadel Vertex 03 2023 is a high performance padel racket that has been designed for adult players who have an advanced or professional level, who have a correct physical and technical preparation. It has a weight between 365 and 375 grams.
It has a diamond shape with a high balance and a reduced and elevated sweet spot towards the top of the padel racket. These characteristics translate on the court in an extreme power in offensive shots such as in the auctions, which also generates a leverage effect that will turn your shots into unstoppable attacks.
Includes the innovative HESACORE grip.
The inner core is made of MULTIEVA rubber, which consists of two layers with different densities, one compact and one with a lower density, which allows you to react with a powerful ball output against fast balls and get maximum control on slow balls.
On the outside we find Xtend Carbon 12K fiber, biaxially interwoven carbon ribbons that achieve less weight, more rigidity and more resistance. In addition, TOPSPIN technology ensures that the ball grips the faces of the padel racket better and that it spins with more spin, thanks to its rough-finish texture.
Reduces twisting and increases stiffness
The CARBONTUBE frame is made of 100% carbon fiber of very good quality, which achieves a controlled and efficient swing. The frame is protected thanks to the METAL SHIELD, a protector made of aluminum alloy that confers resistance against impacts and protects it both structurally and superficially.
On top of the METAL SHIELD protector is the CUSTOM WEIGHT, which allows the weight of the padel racket to be modified to adapt to the needs of each player, whether offering more balance, power or control.
In order to reduce vibrations after an impact, Bullpadel has added to this model the VIBRADRIVE technology, a fist mounting system that inserts an elastic rubber piece.

name: WILSON BELA PRO V2
description:
Wilson Bela Pro V2, the official racket of the professional player Fernando Belasteguín
The Wilson Bela Pro V2 is the official padel racket of Fernando Belasteguín, a professional padel player who is ranked number 5 on the World Padel Tour circuit.
This padel racket is ideal for a versatile game of attack and defence. This racket is diamond-shaped with a high balance for better attacking shots. With a larger contact point, designed at the request of Fernando Belasteguin to deliver powerful shots. It is made with a Firm EVA rubber core to provide extra power in your shots. The profile of the racket is 38 mm and it weighs around 370 grams.
A firm-touch racket for a powerful shot
The frame is made from premium carbon combined with 3K carbon fibre faces. The carbon faces have a slightly soft touch to compensate for the harder Firm EVA rubber core.
This is a resistant and firm padel racket for playing powerful shots. The frame is solid and durable. The softer faces allow a slight cushioning, allowing for better control in the power of your shots. The firmness of the core allows you to hit with energy and attack with power. Clean and firm shots thanks to the rigid EVA rubber
A Wilson racket with textured surface for better grip and spin
With SpinEffect technology, a rough-textured surface to improve spin through an improved hold on the ball,  and Sharp Hole technology, for better ball contact due to the hole perforations
The racket has a removable and customisable strap. This racket has a striking and unique design with the body completely in red and the grip in black. Get your new Wilson racket now!

name: ADIDAS ADIPOWER LIGHT 3.3
description: Adidas Adipower Light 3.3, lightness and control at the highest level. The Adidas Adipower Light 3.3 is the official padel racket of the player Mafalda Fernandes for the 2023 season, who bets for this model due to its high performance and quality. Designed for advanced or professional padel players looking for control. It has a round shape, with a sweet spot in the center and a low balance. These characteristics facilitate a great control in the stroke, since they distribute the weight towards the fist area, which facilitates the handling. This 2024 padel racket has alight weight ( 345-360 grams ), which allows for easier handling and faster and more agile movements on the court. Manageable and durable padel racket In terms of materials, the core is made of EVA Soft Performance rubber, a low-density foam that provides great ball exit and optimum comfort when striking the ball. It offers excellent performance in low-speed shots or with a static padel racket. The frame, on the other hand, is made of 50% fiberglass, which adds lightness, durability and responsiveness. It helps reduce vibrations thanks to its excellent shock absorption. The faces of this model are composed of Alutex, a fiberglass with an aluminized treatment, which stands out for its high flexibility and allows exceptional comfort, durability and power in each stroke. With Structural Reinforcement Likewise, Spin Blade Mold technology has been inserted in the planes, which consists of a 3D relief that increases the level of grip of the ball on the faces of the padel racket and helps generate more power and spin in each stroke. The Power Embossed Ridge has been included in the frame, an inner carbon rib that increases the rigidity of the structure and increases the durability of the padel racket. It also has the Dual Exoskeleton, which is a double insertion of carbon composite ribs that reinforce the core and the frame.

name: NOX AT10 GENIUS 18K ALUM BY AGUSTIN TAPIA 2025
description:
Nox AT10 Genius 18K Alum Genius By Agustín Tapia 2025, firmness and durability
The AT10 Genius 18K Alum By Agustín Tapia padel racket is a teardrop model created in collaboration with Agustín Tapia that provides an ideal balance to add speed in defensive shots and power in attacks.
With a weight that varies between 360 and 375 grams, this padel racket is characterized by being manageable and agile, which facilitates a fast and precise game.
AT10 Genius 18K Alum Agustín Tapia AT10 padel racket, for professionals.
The AT10 Genius 18K Alum 2025 is ideal for those high-level padel players looking for a high-performance model, made of resistant materials and incorporating the latest technologies to help improve their performance on the court.
It offers a comfortable, solid and controlled feel, making it perfect for demanding players who enjoy both attacking and defending.
AT10 Genius 18K Alum 2025 Features

18K Alum Carbon 18K flats for a much more comfortable, solid feel and consistent performance.
Exclusive Spin 3D patterned surface with rough sand finish for more spin and ball control
Carbon Frame tubular frame for durability and stiffness
Multi-layer MLD Black EVA core, which optimizes ball output on defense and adds power on offensive shots
Increased maneuverability and redistributed weight thanks to the EOS Flap
With Custom Grip for increased grip and less vibrations
Reduced post-impact vibrations with the Pulse System
Reduced cracking on the outside with the Dynamic Composite Structure
Interchangeable Smartstrap safety lanyard
Teardrop shape
Luxury Series Range

Get your hands on the Nox AT10 Genius 18K Alum By Agustín Tapia 2025 at Pādel Nuestro.
With the Nox AT10 Genius 18K Alum By Agustín Tapia 2025 teardrop-shaped padel racket you will achieve precise, spin-filled and comfortable strokes. Designed for versatile players of advanced level.

name: ADIDAS ADIPOWER MULTIWEIGHT CTRL 3.3
description: Adidas Adipower Multiweight CTRL 3.3, perfect for defensive strokes Adidas presents, as part of its 2024 collection, the Adipower Multiweight CTRL 3.3, an ideal padel racket for advanced level padel players, who practice the sport intensely and frequently and seek to improve their performance on the court. Thanks to its round shape, large sweet spot in the center and low balance, this padel racket provides unbeatable control and exceptional handling that allows for agile and quick movements. A highlight of this model is that its weight can vary. In general, it ranges from 355 to 365 grams, but you can add 9 grams more to modify both the weight and balance to adapt it to the needs of each match. Great durability As for the materials, we find in the core a high density foam known as  EVA High Memory rubber, which increases the power in higher speed strokes. On the other hand, the frame has been manufactured with carbon fiber, which gives it optimal strength and durability. The faces are composed of 18K carbon fiber braided filaments, which increases the rigidity and resistance of the padel racket. Rigid and resistant structure Also, regarding the technologies incorporated in this Adidas 2024 padel racket, we can mention the Structural Reinforcement, which consists of perimeter reinforcements that generate greater resistance to high torsion. The Spin Bladel Decal and Smart Holes Curve, two technologies that improve the feeling of control and the degree of effect that the player can print on the ball, have been included with the aim of facilitating the ball to spin with more effect. It also incorporates the Power Embossed Ridge and Dual Exoskeleton technologies, which provide greater rigidity to the structure and reinforce the frame and core of the padel racket.

name: BULLPADEL NEURON
description: Bullpadel Neuron, fast and easy acceleration with little effort. The new Bullpadel Neuron is a padel racket that has been designed to bring the best performance on court to those padel players of advanced level or professionals looking to accelerate the ball at the right time. The professional player Fede Chingotto will face the 2024 season wielding this Bullpadel padel racket. As for its shape, it presents a hybrid mold with low balance, so it offers a great compromise between power and control, with a medium feel and ball output. It provides exceptional versatility so that you can adapt to the needs of the game at all times. It has a standard weight between 365 and 375 grams, so the maneuverability and ease of handling are acceptable for high-level players. Stability to avoid twisting In the inner core we find a Multieva rubber that combines a more compact outer layer that gives great power output, and an inner layer of a lower density that provides control on slow balls. The planes are made with Xtend Carbon 12K, a type of carbon interlaced up to 30% lighter, which achieves greater power, stiffness and durability. In addition, the bi-directional interlocking 100% carbon CarbonTube frame provides excellent responsiveness through a balanced combination of power and control. Reduced padel racket flexes Wave System technology has also been incorporated into the frame , which provides greater flexibility to the area with the aim of making the transmission of energy smoother and more efficient. A catapult effect is achieved, so that the player must exert less effort when hitting. In the same way, it has the Neuron heart, a horizontal bridge with a vertex break that absorbs vibrations effectively to reduce fatigue and increase the level of comfort during the match. Also, it includes the Vibradrive cuff mounting system and the Hesacore Grip, which reduce vibrations, stress and the possibility of injury.

name: BABOLAT TECHNICAL VIPER 2023
description:
Get the maximum power with the Technical Viper 2023 from Babolat.
The new Babolat Technical Viper 2023 padel racket is designed for players with a technical level of play and who also enjoy attacking and dominating on the court. It has a diamond shape with a high balance, the sweet spot is located in the upper part of the padel racket and is smaller. This padel racket is the twin and belongs to the same line that Juan Lebrón will wield in the 2023 season. It is a padel racket for demanding players.
Surprise your opponent
In the inner core of the Technical Viper 2023 we find 3 different layers of X-EVA rubber, the two outer layers are stiffer, while the inner layer is softer. Their combination gives the padel racket more comfort and tolerance, but with an explosive power in each stroke.
On the outside we find 12K carbon fiber, which provides great precision, maximum power and flexibility and a soft touch, which will allow a greater ball output from the bottom of the padel court. On the surface we also find the 3D SPIN + technology, some reliefs, which in combination with the rough finish of this padel racket, will allow the player to obtain great control of his racket and greater access to the effects of the ball. You will be an unstoppable technical attacker.
Same essence and playability with a powerful design.
For unmatched accuracy when returning shots, the Technical Viper 2023 features the Holes Pattern System technology, in which the size and distribution of the holes have been optimized to increase power and accuracy when hitting.
Another technology found in this fabulous padel racket is the Vibrabsorb System, a technology that helps reduce vibrations and the risk of injury, thanks to the elastomer incorporated in its core.
The Technical Viper 2023 offers great comfort, explosive power and spin in the blows, and with a modern and exclusive design that embellishes the athlete's game.

name: SIUX SPYDER LITE 3 HARD
description: Siux Spyder Revolution Lite 3 Hard, professional padel racket with a diamond shape. The Siux Spyder Revolution 3 Lite Attack Hard is a precision weapon designed to meet the needs of advanced and professional padel racket players looking to perfect their attacking technique. With a diamond-shaped design, this padel racket offers a high balance, allowing players to maximize the power of their strokes, ideal for those who want to dominate the red and perform powerful smashes. Hard touch padel racket with EVA Hard rubber. The weight of the padel racket varies between 355 and 375 grams. The EVA Hard  coreand 12K Carbon faces ensure a solid and durable structure, while the 3K tubular provides greater stability and flexibility. The feel of this padel racket is exceptionally hard, giving players a powerful feel on every shot. The rubber-embossed  Dual Pro Grip offers an ergonomic and comfortable grip, allowing for superior control. To reduce vibrations on ball impact, the padel racket is equipped with Shockout Dampeners inserted in the dies, ensuring a smoother and more comfortable playing experience with less vibrations. The design of this padel racket is equally impressive, with a glossy finish highlighting the black faces and cuff, while the core and frame are presented in a blue and violet color scheme, giving it a striking and attractive look. All in all, the Siux Spyder Revolution 3 Lite Attack Hard Padel Racket is an outstanding choice for advanced or professional level players who want a padel racket that offers power, precision and durability, along with a stylish and attractive on-court design. With its high quality features and exceptional performance, this padel racket is an essential tool for those looking to master padel.

name: ADIDAS ADIPOWER MULTIWEIGHT 2023
description:
Get maximum power and comfort with Adidas Adipower Multiweight 2023.
Adidas Adipower Multiweight 2023 is a padel racket for advanced or professional players. Its shape is Diamond Oversize for an attacking power game. Its weight is between 345-360 grams. With materials such as EVA High Memory  rubber and  customizable weight technology.
You are a padel player who needs a racket with which to make efficient use of the power in the blows. With its Embossed Ridge and Dual Exoskeleton technology you will be able to hit your shots with the highest speed and intensity. The frame is made with a carbon outer rib and double-height ribs that reinforce the core and frame. This combination provides great rigidity to the padel racket.
It varies the effects you give the ball thanks toSpin Blade andSmart Hole Curve technology. The roughness of the faces and the arrangement of the holes in curved lines guarantees you better grip and shot effects.
For high performance padel racket players who need the guarantee of a durable racket. The padel racket is reinforced on the perimeter to be more resistant to stress and twisting during play.
A resistant and long-lasting version for PRO padel athletes.
Created with the best materials, its frame is made of carbon and the surface is made of 15K aluminized carbon. The surface has a medium, slightly high flexibility. Thanks to this you enjoy the balance between power and comfort in the blows.
Inside the padel racket there is EVAHigh Memory rubber. This high density rubber adapts to the most aggressive and high speed shots. It is suitable for players of high technical level on the court who want the best power play.
Because you are a player who needs to be in control
This padel racket is perfect for padel racket players at the PRO level who play regularly and need a versatile, resistant and durable racket. With its Diamond Oversize body shape you get a high sweet spot balance and large hitting surface. But with its  Weight & Balance System technology you can vary the weight of the padel racket perimeter in the frame of the same. Remove the weight to get the balance towards the fist and have more control over the padel racket.

name: BULLPADEL FLOW W 24
description: Bullpadel Flow W 24, diamond padel racket for PRO players. The Bullpadel Flow W 24 is a high-end padel racket designed for advanced or professional level players looking for exceptional performance on the court. This padel racket is part of Bullpadel's PRO line and has been developed in collaboration with leading padel player Alejandra Salazar as part of the exciting 2024 collection. One of the standout features of the padel racket is its diamond shape, which makes it exceptionally light and maneuverable. This allows players to experience great maneuverability on the court and execute precise shots with ease. The combination of the diamond shape and weight makes it a perfect choice for players who prefer an aggressive, attack-oriented game. Padel racket with excellent composition The construction of this padel racket is top quality. Its outer composition is made of Fibrix, which provides durability and wear resistance. The core is composed of MultiEVA with several layers of different densities, to handle shots of different speeds. The  FlowForce  corecontributes to stability and power on every stroke. The faces feature a  3D Grain rough finish, designed to increase spin on the ball, allowing players to hit spin-loaded shots with ease. The frame is made of CarbonTube, a 100% carbon fiber that provides stiffness and durability without adding unnecessary weight. An important aspect to highlight is theVibradrive  system  incorporated in this padel racket, which absorbs vibrations to provide a feeling of comfort in the game and reduce the risk of repetitive strain injuries. The design is elegant and sophisticated, with a white color scheme that highlights the brand's logo and gold details. This padel racket not only stands out for its exceptional performance on the court, but also for its eye-catching aesthetics.

name: NOX TL10 QUANTUM 12K BY TINO LIBAAK 2025
description:
Nox TL10 Quantum 12K By Tino Libaak 2025, ideal versatility
The Nox TL10Quantum 12K is a padel racket designed in collaboration with the player Tino Libaak for the new season 2025. It has been manufactured with a teardrop shape to provide incredible versatility in every padel match or training.

Nox TL10 Quantum 12K, for advanced players
This Nox men's padel racket has been specifically designed to achieve an unparalleled level of versatility and power, which will help advanced or professional padel players adapt effectively to any situation on the court.
This model ensures intermediate feel, comfort and fast play to make you a lethal player on the court.
Features and technologies of Nox TL10 Quantum 12K

12K Carbon sole for increased durability and strength
High density HR3 Color EVA rubber core for power and good ball output
Carbon Frame for increased protection against impact and breakage
Exclusive Spin Technology faces, with double rough finish for more spin on the ball
Custom Grip and Pulse System for a firmer grip and effective vibration reduction
With EOS Flap technology for better grip and better handling

Unique experience with the Nox TL10 Quantum 12K By Tino Libaak

name: BABOLAT AIR VIPER 2023
description:
Babolat Air Viper 2023, score the decisive point with an aerial attack.
Babolat Air Viper 2023 is a padel racket to counterattack. With hybrid body shape. It marks with air attacks, frame and faces of carbon and multi-EVA core. With a weight around 355 grams.
It is a padel racket with a hybrid body design for fast and attacking padel players on the court. A super easy to handle padel racket for you to hit the best effects and attacks with power thanks to the materials and technologies used.
A padel racket that adapts to your techniques and intensity of play.
The hybrid body of this padel racket together with the materials chosen to make it will make you have an exceptional performance on the court. The faces have a surface made from carbon 16K, this material is resistant and medium-high hardness to the touch of the blows. So you can hit with strength and power. Also the surfaces are designed with 3D Spin +, a 3D rough relief that gives a different grip to better control the effects you give the ball.
Adapt to all types of play with this triple EVA rubber core. There are 3 layers of different densities and hardnesses placed as a sandwich to enjoy a comfortable feel in the most aggressive shots. And do not suffer the unpleasant sensation of vibrations thanks to its Vibrabsorb System. Elastomer is added to the bridge to compensate for the stiffness of the carbon.
A padel racket that handles easily in the fastest movements.
Extreme maneuverability thanks to its Holes Pattern System and Smart Buttcap technologies. A more efficient distribution of the body dies and a custom size to lighten the weight of the padel racket and increase power and precision when sending shots to your opponent. Also with its Smart Buttcap you can change and play with the strap that best suits your needs in each game.

name: BULLPADEL HACK 03 24
description:
Bullpadel Hack 03 24, the definitive Paquito Navarro's 2024 padel racket.
The Bullpadel Hack 03 24, part of the 2024 collection and developed in collaboration with the legendary Paquito Navarro, embodies perfection in every stroke. Designed for advanced and professional level players, this padel racket is the ultimate choice for those looking for a powerful and technical game.
The diamond shape is ideal for working on power technique, making it the perfect tool for dominating the court. The Tricarbon upper and MultiEVA multi-density core ensure a unique combination of durability and responsiveness, resulting in unmatched performance on every shot.
The Aluminum CW technology in the padel racket's protector provides additional durability and protection, ensuring that it remains in perfect condition even after the most intense matches. In addition, the Air React Channel system and the 100% carbon tubular CarbonTube make this padel racket exceptionally light and aerodynamic, allowing you to move quickly around the court with absolute control.
Play with spin with 3D Grain Finish
With a 3D Grain rough finish, which provides exceptional grip and allows you to print devastating spin on the ball. In addition, the Metalshield frame incorporates CustomWeight technology, allowing you to customize the balance of the padel racket to your individual preferences, giving you even more control over your game.
With the Vibradrive system, which reduces annoying arm vibrations and allows you to play more comfortably and worry-free. The Hack heart and Nerve channels in the frame bring extra stability and power to your shots, making every point a step closer to victory. It is equipped with the Hesacorre Grip, which helps prevent injuries caused by vibrations.

name: NOX ML10 PRO CUP ROUGH SURFACE EDITION 23
description:
NOX ML10 PRO CUP ROUGH SURFACE EDITION 23, NEW NOX COLLECTION
The ML10 Pro Cup Black Editon Arena 2023 forms part of the Nox Pro Cup family. With a spectacular, colourful, and modern design, this racket provides control and is designed with a rough appearance to give you the best sensation after every shot.
It is round and made with a mixture of materials and exclusive Nox technologies that enhance your performance even during the most demanding padel matches.
Player type
This racket provides us with 100% control and 90% power. It is perfect for intermediate-advanced players who are looking for a comfortable, manageable and durable racket, with a wide contact point in the centre and a low balance.
Technical characteristics
Identical to its Pro Cup and Pro Cup Black sisters in every way, this racket stands out due to the Nox CARBON FRAME (100% carbon) combined with Silver Fibreglass faces for greater rigidity, durability, and extra power.
This racket’s finish is one of the key characteristics of its design; ROUGH SURFACE technology provides a rough finish using silica sand to ensure greater spin.
It has an HR3 CORE that provides extra power for every spin shot.
Design and colours
With a round shape, this racket has a modern and colourful look that combines the classic Nox logos and letters in a vibrant red.
The ML10 Pro Cup Black Editon Arena 2023 forms part of the Nox Pro Cup family. With a spectacular, colourful, and modern design, this racket is designed for control and has a rough finish to give you the best sensation after each shot.
With a round shape, it is made using a mixture of materials and exclusive Nox technologies that enhance performance during the most demanding padel matches.

A racket that provides us with 100% control and 90% power. It is perfect for intermediate-advanced players who are looking for a comfortable, manageable and durable racket, with a wide contact point in the centre and a low balance.

name: ADIDAS ADIPOWER CTRL 3.3
description: Adidas Adipower CTRL 3.3, improved accuracy and firmnessAdidas presents, as part of its 2024 collection, the Adipower CTRL 3.3 racket , a model designed for those advanced level padel players who practice frequently to improve control in their stroke. It has a round shape, a low balance and a large sweet spot located in the center of the padel racket. This allows a superb control in each stroke, since the weight is inclined towards the fist and allows a more precise and firm handling. High quality EVA Soft Performance rubber makes up the inner core, a low-density foam that ensures excellent ball output and comfortable play at all times. The flats, on the other hand, are made of 3K carbon fiber, a fabric that provides superior stiffness that results in greater power when hitting. This material provides exceptional durability, strength and flexibility. The frame contains 50% carbon fiber, making it an extremely light and durable padel racket. Optimally absorbs vibrations, which reduces the possibility of injury by increasing dampening. With Structural Reinforcement Technology If we focus on technologies, we can highlight the Spin Blade Mold, a roughness with 3D relief inserted in the mold with the aim of increasing the power and grip of the ball so that it spins with more effect. With the same intention it incorporates the Smart Holes Curve, an ideal arrangement of the dies to achieve spin on your shots. In the bridge we observe the Dual Exoskeleton technology, which consists of a double insertion of carbon ribs that provide extra reinforcement to vulnerable areas, such as the heart or the frame of the padel racket. In addition, the Power Embossed Ridge technology has been inserted, an inner carbon rib that runs through the frame providing exceptional rigidity to the structure for greater durability.

name: Head Radical Pro 2024
description:
Head Radical Pro, outstanding attack and defense
The new Head Radical Pro is a padel racket that has been specifically designed for strategic players who seek to control the game and enjoy making volleys, chiquitas and trays. 
If we focus on its format, its teardrop shape with a sweet spot in the center stands out, so it offers a very balanced handling and controlled power. This shape allows to exert a leverage effect to print power in the shots without losing control and precision. 
In addition, it has the Optimized Sweet Spot, which adapts the drilling pattern to achieve greater power and control. It weighs 370 grams.
Vibration Absorption
On the other hand, the planes of this Head Radical padel racket are made of Carbon 3K, a rigid and resistant high quality material that gives you precision in the stroke to enjoy a more controlled and direct feeling of the ball. 
In the inner core we find the Control Foam rubber, a foam that provides great comfort by reducing vibrations after the impact of the ball, and at the same time, increases the level of power when hitting.
The frame includes the Smart Bridge, which is responsible for adapting the bridge area depending on the needs of the padel racket. While, due to the Tailored Tube, each section has been constructed individually in order to improve the performance of the padel racket.
Modern, powerful and striking design
In terms of performance, the Head Radical Pro incorporates the Auxetic technology, which consists of a construction located in the bridge of this padel racket and offers an incredible feeling of impact, greater feedback and a huge confidence in each stroke.
In addition, the Soft Butt Cap provides a much softer and more cushioned feel, reducing vibrations after impact.

name: ADIDAS CROSS IT
description: Adidas Cross IT 2024, more power in the aggressive shots Designed for professional or advanced padel players , the new Adidas Cross IT is the ideal racket if you are looking to hit with maximum power in attacking plays. It has an oversize diamond shape with a sweet spot located in the head of the padel racket, which will provide enormous power to make your shots lethal. Its weight ranges between 360 and 375 grams, which favors a light and easy handling. Optimized flexibility In terms of its composition, EVA High Memory rubber has been incorporated into the inner core, a high density foam that provides more power in the most intense and fast strokes. A technical level is required to take full advantage of the benefits offered by this type of rubber. On the other hand, the planes have been manufactured with Carbon Aluminized 15K, braided carbon fiber filaments that increase the strength and flexibility of the padel racket thanks to the aluminized treatment. In high speed strokes the padel racket recovers its original shape with more speed. The frame is made of carbon fiber, a resistant material that improves the durability of the padel racket. Vulnerable areas with extra reinforcement In addition, the surface has a 3D embossed roughness thanks to Spin Blade Mold technology, which increases the grip and power of the ball so that it spins faster and with more spin. The Dynamic Air Flow technology, on the other hand, improves maneuverability by promoting a continuous air flow through the heart of the padel racket. Meanwhile, due to the Power Extra Grip, greater inertia is achieved and the sweet spot is shifted towards the head. It also incorporates Structural Reinforcement technology which, by means of perimeter reinforcements strategically placed in the padel racket's mold, increases resistance to high torsion.

name: HEAD EXTREME ONE 2023
description: Head Extreme One 2023, the lightest padel racket of the Extreme collection. Padel racket Head Extreme One 2023, designed for the most demanding players, this high-end padel racket is the perfect choice for those looking for exceptional performance on the court. For an advanced player as a professional, the Extreme One is a padel racket in diamond format to develop a power technique. Weighing around 345 grams, the Extreme One is positioned as the lightest padel racket in the Extreme collection, allowing you extreme comfort and maneuverability during long sessions on the court. Padel racket with no die-cutting for a more resistant surface. One of the most notable features of this padel racket is its die-less design (it has a single hole per FIP regulations), which provides a more resistant hitting surface. This translates into exceptional durability, allowing you to play your aggressive game without worrying about wear and tear. The  Extreme Spin  technologyincorporated in the rough surfaces of the padel racket gives you unparalleled spin on every shot. With this innovation, you will be able to print a surprising spin to the ball. Auxetic technology adds an extra dimension to your game by providing optimized response on every swing. In addition, its construction with 12K carbon in the medium-touch planes guarantees a perfect feel with every stroke. On the other hand, the  Power Foam rubber core offers explosive power. Optimized padel racquet with the best technologies It has a reinforced bridge, Smart Bridge. An optimized sweet spot to hit with precision in an easier way. It has a protector in the frame, Anti Shock, to protect the padel racket from friction. Tubular cut to measure, Tailored Frame and Soft Butt Cap grip that dampens and absorbs vibrations. Impressive design as it is a padel racket in black color completely.

name: BABOLAT TECHNICAL VIPER 2024
description: Babolat Technical Viper, row it by 3 with explosiveness. Designed to offer the best performance to technical attacking padel players, the Babolat Technical Viper 2024 will bring you explosiveness, spin and comfort in every shot. It has a diamond shape with a high balance, a format that stands out for its great ability to generate power in the stroke. Thanks to its weight distribution towards the head area, volleys and smashes are incredibly powerful. Technical Viper of Babolat, maximum precision This model is an excellent choice to face your most important matches due to the quality of its materials. Starting with the planes, which have been manufactured with 12K carbon fiber, which provides explosive power and exceptional precision. In the core we observe X EVA, three layers of EVA rubber, which offer greater power (due to the stiffness of the two outer layers) and a higher level of comfort and tolerance in slow strokes (thanks to the softer inner layer). Get power and spin on every shot This Babolat 2024 padel racket incorporates rough-finish reliefs on the surface that favor the achievement of shots full of spin and control thanks to the 3D Spin+ technology. It also has the Vibrabsorb System by SMAC technology, a system that ensures optimal and effective vibration absorption, due to the combination of elastomers integrated into the carbon fibers of the heart of the padel racket. Likewise, it includes the Holes Pattern System technology , which consists of optimizing the size and distribution of the dies in order to increase precision, firmness and power in the return of blows. And, to add comfort and adapt to your needs at all times, it also incorporates the  Smart Buttcap system that allows you to remove the strap to change or wash it.

name: BULLPADEL ELITE W 24
description: Bullpadel Elite W 24, Gemma Triay's elite padel racket. The Bullpadel Elite W 24 is an exceptional teardrop-shaped padel racket part of the 2024 collection designed in collaboration with the outstanding professional player Gemma Triay. This padel racket perfectly combines a sleek design with high-level performance, making it the ideal choice for players looking for a versatile balance on the court. One of the most notable features of the Bullpadel Elite W 24 is its teardrop shape, which gives it a medium balance. This design provides exceptional control over the power of your shots, allowing you to place the ball accurately at every point on the court. High-end composition The composition of the padel racket is impressive, with an outer layer of Xtend Carbon 3K and a MultiEVA core. This combination of materials ensures excellent durability and consistent response on every shot. In addition, the core of the padel racket is reinforced for increased inertia and firmness, allowing you to execute powerful shots with confidence. Air React Channel technology is another highlight of the Bullpadel Elite W 24. This innovative feature makes the padel racket lighter and more aerodynamic, making it easier for you to move around the court and improving your ability to react quickly to your opponent's shots. Vibradrive technology, which incorporates an elastomer in the grip, plays a key role in reducing unwanted vibrations during play. This not only improves the comfort of your grip, but also helps minimize the risk of repetitive strain injuries. It features a clean, sleek design in white with black and pink accents.

name: DUNLOP RENEGADE SOFT
description:
Reasons to choose the Dunlop Renegade Soft racket
Choosing a Dunlop racket like this comes with a number of benefits, such as strength and speed, that a beginner should take advantage of. Carbon is the reason for the low weight and excellent firmness that this unisex padel racket has to offer.
What level of player is the Dunlop Renegade Soft racket for?
It is designed for new or inexperienced players looking for their first padel racket. The Dunlop Renegade Soft racket makes it easier for the player to adapt and control the ball.
Design and colours
The Dunlop branding stands out in the center of the face in white, against a black background. The pink details along with the round shape make it unique.
Technical characteristics of the Dunlop Renegade Soft racket

Frame made of carbon, a material that provides the necessary rigidity for a padel racket of such wonderful quality.
Face made of carbon, which makes it incredibly resistant against shape loss caused by the ball’s impact.
EVA soft rubber core, whose low density prevents elbow injuries caused by vibrations.
Soft and comfortable handle to ensure a comfortable and adequate grip for players starting out with this racket.
Round-shaped structure, suitable for a style of play in which ball control prevails.

name: BULLPADEL HACK 04 HYBRID 25
description:
Bullpadel Hack 04 Hybrid 25, incredible benefits
The Bullpadel Hack 04 Hybrid 25, official padel racket of Paquito Navarro, is designed to offer exceptional performance in every game. With its hybrid shape and high balance, it ensures a combination of power and perfect control to adapt effectively to any game situation.
With a weight that varies between 365 and 375 grams, this model offers agile handling and good maneuverability. The innovation of the Hack 04 Hybrid 25 lies in its ability to transform extreme power into dynamic power, which allows to take full advantage of the player's speed to print strength and control in each impact.
Hack 04 Hybrid 25 padel racket, for advanced players.
Ideal for professional or advanced players looking for precision without sacrificing power. The Bullpadel Hack 04 Hybrid 25 not only stands out for its power, but also for its perfect balance between control and performance, making it a versatile option for those looking for a dynamic and precise game.
Bullpadel's Hack 04 Hybrid 25 technologies and features

Multieva rubber core for excellent control on slow strokes and power on fast strokes.
100% bi-directional interlocking carbon frame adds strength and light weight.
Air React Channel increases frame firmness
3D Tricarbon surface improves response on the stroke
3DGrain polygonal finish for increased grip to print spin on shots
Vibradrive system optimizes shock absorption, offering a more comfortable and stable strike.
Thanks to the CustomWeight system, the balance of the padel racket can be adjusted according to the player's needs.

Reach your maximum potential with the Bullpadel Hack 04 Hybrid 25 at Pādel Nuestro.
The Bullpadel Hack 04 Hybrid 25 is ideal for those looking for power and control in every play, offering one of the best performances in the padel market.

name: DUNLOP SKIN CONTROL PADEL RACKET
description:
Why choose the Dunlop Skin Control racket?
 With its teardrop shape, the Dunlop Skin Control racket has a medium balance that provides a good balance between accuracy and power in your shots.
Who is this padel racket designed for?
 This padel racket is designed for advanced players or even professionals. It is ideal for padel players looking for speed in their game without losing control on the court.
Racket design and colors
 The Dunlop Skin Control racket has a great color contrast, between the black of the base paint and the white of the logo on its faces. It also has blue detailing on the heart and frame that give it a dynamic and sporty feel.
The Dunlop Skin Control’s technical features

Carbon fiber. This material provides the racket frame with resistance and its faces with rigidity, for extra power behind the shot.
EVA rubber. This is used in the racket’s core, to increase control of the spin while absorbing vibrations to prevent muscle fatigue.
Rough surface. This helps to generate spin on shots more easily.
Teardrop shape. Its contact point is located on the head of the racket and, in addition, it provides greater strength behind the spin.
Medium balance. For good balance between directional control and power when hitting the ball.

name: HEAD EXTREME PRO
description: Head Extreme PRO 2024, diamond padel racket for professional players. Head Extreme PRO 2024, official padel racket of the Spanish professional padel player Arturo Coello. The heaviest padel racket of the Extreme line of Head padel racquets with 370 grams. Padel racket designed for advanced or professional players. Its diamond-shaped body is designed for a power game. Its high balance and heavy head allow you to hit with maximum power at all times. Power padel racket with carbon fiber and glass. The frame and faces are made from a blend of carbon fiber and fiberglass for maximum strength. The Hybrid Woven planes combine both materials to enjoy the best of each. The core is made of  Power Foam rubber that maximizes the power of the ball on every shot. Optimized Sweet Spot, optimized sweet spot for easy and efficient center hits. Extreme Spin, rough finish on the planes to achieve the best effects. Auxetic  technology  allows the padel racket to expand under traction and contract under pressure. The padel racket deforms slightly adapting to each situation during the game. Padel racket reinforced and resistant. Smart Bridge, the design of the bridge is optimized to adapt to the player and the type of game generating the best sensations on the court. Tailored Frame, the tubular is carefully designed and cut to give the best performance of the padel racket. Includes Anti Shock in the frame that protects the padel racket from bumps and scratches while you play to prolong its life. The padel racket will look like new for much longer. Soft Butt Cap handle reduces pressure and dampens vibrations to prevent injuries. Sporty and modern design in black and green.

name: WILSON PRO STAFF V2 TEAM
description:
Why buy the Wilson Pro Staff V2 Team padel racket?
It is a padel racket with a low balance and a very wide contact point. Both factors favour the delivery of powerful and very precise attacks and returns.
The hole pattern covers a large area of the faces, which provides great lightness and a lot of stability when making complicated returns.
What type of player is the Wilson Pro Staff V2 Team padel racket for?
It is for men and women who play padel at intermediate levels and need a reliable racket for a control style.
Design and colours
The Wilson Pro Staff V2 Team padel racket is designed with a round shape. The faces and frame are dark matte grey, contrasted with yellow and red details. The Wilson logo stands out in the centre of the faces, with a large "W" in a deep red gradient colour.
Technical characteristics of the Wilson Pro Staff V2 Team padel racket

The frame is made of high-strength fibreglass. This ensures great durability, even with very intense and frequent use.
The faces have a completely smooth finish, which favours ball effects and lobs that are more difficult for opponents to respond to.
The core incorporates EVA soft rubber to add flexibility and comfort in all shots.
The completely smooth finish on the faces allows very accurate backspins, even from the back of the court.
The heart has a very wide triangular hole to provide a very extensive swing to hand movements.

name: ADIDAS METALBONE YOUTH 3.2 JUNIOR 2023
description:
Start your child in the world of padel with the new Metalbone Youth 3.2
Adidas presents the Metalbone Youth 3.2, an  oversize diamond-shaped padel racket in the new 2023 collection, with the pillars of this sport in mind. In addition, the high balance and the sweet spot located in the head will provide unparalleled power to each stroke.
As it is designed for the young public, it has been designed taking into account the lightness as one of the most important points. Therefore, its weight ranges between 330 and 345gr. This padel racket offers an unbeatable mobility, it is light and with it the game will be very dynamic and agile.
A padel racket for beginners at the height of an advanced level.
It also has a glass surface combined with low-density EVA Soft Performance rubber, which makes it more comfortable and easier to play with. Serves will be more accurate.
The frame, as well as the surface, is made of fiberglass, a soft touch fabric that provides elasticity and flexibility to the padel racket, achieving a great ball output.
Specially designed for the youngest players
The Metalbone Youth 3.2 also offers excellent playing flexibility, as it incorporates the Smart Holes Curve, which will allow you to surprise both your opponents and spectators with your first trays and the effects that the ball achieves when it falls on the court.
As we also find in its adult version, this model includes the  Octogonal Structure technology, characteristic of this line of Adidas. Thanks to it, the shots will have a plus of power and will be much more lethal on the court.
As for its exterior design, it has the white logo drawn in large dimensions along the body of the padel racket, with the base in black, which leaves no doubt that it is an Adidas padel racket.
Get your hands on the new Metalbone Youth 3.2 padel racket and start enjoying the joys of this sport with your child!

name: ADIDAS ADIPOWER MULTIWEIGHT 3.3
description: Adidas Adipower Multiweight 3.3, more speed and control.  Designed for high-level padel players who practice the sport frequently and intensely, the Adidas Adipower Multiweight 3.3 provides superb control on fast movements. It has a rounded shape, low balance and a centered sweet spot, making it ideal if you are looking for improved control and easy maneuverability. Due to the weight system located on the rail of the edge Weight & Balance System Multiweight, this padel racket has the particularity of being able to modify its weight, adding up to 9 grams distributed in 7 screws, to adapt the balance to the needs of the moment. Optimized resistance In terms of materials, the frame is made of carbon fiber, while the faces are made of 18K carbon fiber interwoven filaments. This material guarantees great durability, rigidity and resistance. On the other hand, in the core we find the high density EVA High Memory rubber, a foam that stands out for providing supreme power in the fastest strokes. Full of effect hits It also has an inner carbon rib in the frame called Power Embossed Ridge, which is responsible for increasing the rigidity of the structure. Thanks to the Dual Exoskeleton, the frame and the heart of the padel racket are reinforced so that the player can exert more force on each stroke. In the same way, to improve durability it includes the Structural Reinforcement, which consists of perimeter reinforcements that resist high torsion. And with the intention that the player can hit the ball with much more effect and be able to surprise their opponents more easily, it incorporates the Spin Blade Decal relief and the Smart Holes Curve, an arrangement of the holes designed to facilitate the use of effects.

name: BULLPADEL HACK 02 PRF 2024
description:

Aerodynamic design

In addition, it offers good lightness and maneuverability for agile and fast strokes. It provides a precise response on defensive shots and helps reduce vibrations.
The inner core, on the other hand, is made of EVA Soft Performance rubber, a foam that ensures an indescribable feeling of comfort in each stroke, since it absorbs impacts in an optimal way and effectively dampens vibrations, generating a softer and more comfortable hitting sensation. It also provides control in shots that require more precision and adaptability to different game situations.
The CarbonTube frame, made of 100% high quality carbon fiber, guarantees excellent power transmission for more powerful and faster strokes. This material also offers greater stiffness, durability and optimal vibration reduction after ball impact.
Comfortable hitting
A detail to highlight is the incorporation of Nerve channels in the frame of this padel racket, which, when combined with the carbon, add superior stability, greater control and precision in the direction and control of the ball, as well as improved response and reaction time.
In the same way, the Bullpadel Hack 02 Performance padel racket incorporates the  Vibradrive system for effective vibration absorption, providing a comfortable feel in every stroke.

name: VAIRO COLUMNS XTREME 2023
description:
Vairo Columns Xtreme 2023, control and power
The Vairo Columns Xtreme 2023 padel racket has been designed for those padel players of advanced or professional level who are looking for a controlled and powerful stroke to enjoy a versatile game in every match.
This model has a hybrid shape with an intermediate balance, which means that it combines the characteristics of a control padel racket and a power racket so that the player can hit with speed and power, while maintaining good precision and control.
This padel racket from Vairo's 2023 collection features a solid, high-quality construction that allows for an exceptional playing experience on the court. In addition, it weighs between 355 and 375 grams and has a medium feel.
Exceptional quality and performance
The tubular frame of the Vairo Columns Xtreme 2023 is made of 100% carbon fiber, which provides great strength, stiffness and durability to the padel racket. Also, this material has the ability to absorb vibrations and improve the power and precision in the stroke.
The core, on the other hand, has been made with EVA foam, a polietileno rubber that improves the ball exit, the performance of the padel racket and the player's comfort during the match, as it reduces vibrations.
3D surface design
On the other hand, the planes are made of 18K Textreme carbon, a fabric that stands out for its incredible resistance, durability and lightness. In addition, it favors a more comfortable hit, since it absorbs vibrations after the impact of the ball.
In addition, the player will be able to hit the ball with spin and create more complex trajectories to surprise the opponent much more easily. This is due to the glossy finish with 3D design of the faces, which favors the achievement of effects when hitting.

name: VAIRO EVERLAST CONFORT 2023
description:
Vairo Everlast Confort 2023, versatility
The new Vairo Everlast Confort 2023 padel racket is designed for those padel players with an advanced or professional level who enjoy fast, powerful and dynamic plays and opt for a more versatile game.
This model has a diamond format and its balance is intermediate, which means that it is a padel racket that stands out for its excellent power and intensity in the most decisive strokes and greater control in soft or defensive strokes.
In addition, thanks to its weight, which ranges from 355 to 375 grams, this padel racket is easy and comfortable to handle at all times.
Incredible resistance
If we now focus on the materials chosen to manufacture this Vairo 2023 padel racket, we can highlight their high quality and resistance, which will guarantee good durability and performance.
Starting with the planes, which are composed of 3K Carbon, a lightweight and durable material that improves the manageability of the padel racket. In addition, it offers more power in fast and aggressive strokes, as well as greater control.
On the other hand, the tubular frame has been manufactured with 50% carbon fiber and 50% fiberglass, an explosive combination that improves the performance, durability, quality and lightness of the padel racket.
Also, for the core of this Vairo padel racket has been chosen EVA rubber, a high density foam and superb quality, which stands out for its incredible power in attacking shots and for offering a sense of security and control.
Stand out wherever you go
On the other hand, this model is capable of attracting all eyes, on and off the court, thanks to its powerful, dynamic and aggressive design, which combines colors such as blue, orange and black, achieving a powerful and energetic aesthetic.

name: VAIRO EVERLAST CROSS 2023
description:
Vairo Everlast Cross 2023, brutal power
The Vairo Everlast Cross 2023 padel racket is designed for those padel players of advanced or professional level to get that extra power needed to shine in an attacking game.
We can mention that it presents a diamond shape with an intermediate balance. This means that it is the perfect ally in aggressive and attacking plays due to its incredible power and intensity. In addition, it weighs between 355 and 375 grams.
Get the best performance
In the core of this Vairo 2023 padel racket we find EVA rubber, a high quality foam that improves the player's performance on the court thanks to its magnificent durability and power in aggressive shots such as the backhand. You will be unstoppable.
The planes are made of 18K Textreme carbon, a very resistant and durable fabric, which gives a harder feel to the padel racket to get a better bounce of the ball. Also, the faces have a 3D glossy finish, which will achieve more speed and control in each stroke.
On the other hand, the tubular frame is made of 100% carbon, which translates into greater comfort, strength, lightness and flexibility in the stroke. The carbon frame absorbs vibrations after impact in an optimal way for more comfort.
Modern and unique design
As for the design, we note a powerful and striking color combination, since green, orange and black have been chosen. This explosive mix of colors will catch all eyes.
Also, the Vairo Everlast Cross 2023 padel racket is very well equipped in terms of technologies, since it incorporates the Structural Column Reinforcement, a system that reinforces the structure of the racket to achieve greater firmness, stability and safety when hitting.

name: VAIRO EVERLAST SPEED 2023
description:
Vairo Everlast Speed 2023, attack without fear
Vairo presents in its new collection 2023 the Everlast Speed racket, a model that has been designed for those padel players of advanced level who enjoy giving the maximum level in attacking games.
This Vairo 2023 padel racket has adiamond shape with a high balance, which translates into a brutal power in attacking plays, achieving aggressive and fast strokes that will surprise your opponents.
With a medium to hard feel, this model has a weight between 355 and 375 grams, a standard weight that allows easy handling to play more comfortably.
Better performance and comfort
The Vairo Everlast Speed 2023 padel racket stands out for the incredible quality and high performance of its materials, which makes it the ideal choice for the most demanding players.
The core is made of EVA foam, a high quality rubber that stands out for its extreme power in shots such as the backhand, which is achieved thanks to the fact that it is a material that flexes little and prints all the force on the ball.
On the other hand, the faces are made of 6K Carbon, a very durable and resistant material that withstands wear ideally. In addition, it stands out for its high vibration absorption and optimal stiffness, which allows for greater precision.
The frame, on the other hand, is tubular and is composed of carbon fiber and fiberglass at 50% each. This achieves a great balance between stiffness and flexibility, as well as good vibration absorption.
Unique and modern design
In terms of technologies, this padel racket incorporates the Reinforced Inmold system, which is a carbon structural reinforcement that guarantees excellent durability, as it is strategically placed in the areas most prone to wear and tear.

name: VAIRO GRAPHENO CONFORT 2023
description:
Vairo Grapheno Confort 2023, great agility and precision.
The Vairo Grapheno Confort 2023 padel racket has been designed for those advanced level padel players who enjoy defending the most on the court and are more inclined to a game of control.
As for its shape, it is round and has a low balance, making it a very easy and comfortable padel racket to handle, which achieves greater control and precision thanks to its sweet spot located in the center, which increases the optimal hitting surface.
Extreme durability
The Vairo Grapheno Confort 2023 padel racket incorporates faces made of 18K Textreme Carbon, a fabric that provides strength and durability, as well as good flexibility and lightness. This fabric also helps to reduce vibrations after ball impact, improving the feel and comfort when striking the ball.
The tubular frame is made of 50% fiberglass and 50% carbon fiber, a rather explosive combination that provides advantages such as good resistance to traction and wear, excellent flexibility and lightness, and great power.
In addition, the core is made of EVA rubber, which guarantees exceptional cushioning, as it reduces vibrations and the impact of the ball. This reduces the possibility of injury and improves the feeling of comfort.
Includes Construction Graph
If we focus on the technologies that incorporates this Vairo 2023 padel racket, we can highlight the Dual Integrated Columns, which consists of a grip system, formed by carbon tubes located in the walls of the heart, which provides extreme elasticity.
It also integrates the Carbon Composite, which is a highly lightweight and rigid material, which aims to improve the performance of the padel racket on the court so that the player can take control at all times.
