name: ENEBE AEROX CARBON 22 PADEL RACKET
description:
Why buy the Enebe Aerox Carbon 22 padel racket?
 It is a padel racket that features a wide contact point and a medium balance. These two elements make it ideal for a versatile style.
 The holes extend in a concentric structure over most of the faces’ surface area. This makes it very light and consistent for attacks and returns that are more difficult for opponents to respond to.
What type of player is the Enebe Aerox Carbon 22 padel racket for?
 It is for adult men who play padel at an advanced level and want a solid racket that guarantees a lot of versatility on the court.
Design and colors
 It is designed in a hybrid, partly round and partly teardrop shape. The frame combines shades of matte black with turquoise blue. The faces are matte dark grey. On the main part of the faces, the classic Enebe initials, ‘NB’, appear in very large letters. These feature an italic font in a pastel beige  tone.
Technical features of the Enebe Aerox Carbon 22 padel racket

The frame is made of high-strength carbon. This guarantees absolute resistance to the high impacts typical of very intense and frequent use.
The faces have carbon with 3K fabric and a rough finish to favor very fast serves.
The core is made of EVA HR3 soft rubber, which ensures a very comfortable touch and enhances the player’s performance.
The reinforced finish of the heart adds solidity to the shots and favors the execution of very effective volleys.
The heart incorporates a wide triangular gap that allows for swings  that are free of turbulence even in the most torsional plays.

Features Bullpadel Vertex 04 25
This Bullpadel Vertex 04 presents new features in the frame. On the one hand, the Curvatik system, a twisted structure, which provides greater resistance to twisting. A section has been introduced in the side of the padel racket, smaller than in its predecessor, which increases rigidity and achieves a better transmission of tensions. This system is linked to the Air Power, a channel generated in a hollow piece, in the lower part, with which the structure is reinforced.
The outer core is made of Xtend Carbon 12k carbon, the inner core in MultiEva and the tubular frame in CarbonTube in 100% carbon. It has the CustomWeight weight plate system allowing to modify the balance of the padel racket according to the needs of each player.
It also incorporates the Vibradrive system, which absorbs vibrations and the Hesacore grip, which reduces effort, vibrations and risk of injury.

name: VIBOR-A DIO TITAN 2025
description:

Designed for environmentally conscious players, this padel racket incorporates sustainability principles into every detail of its manufacturing process, in line with the Science-Based Targets (SBTi) initiative. 
By reducing volatile organic compounds by 80% and using green energy throughout the production process, Vibor-A achieves a modern, planet-friendly padel racket. Its innovative, eco-friendly core is 94% sugarcane-derived materials, reinforcing its commitment to using sustainable materials without compromising the quality of play.
Vibor-A Dio Titan 2025, hybrid padel racket for professional players.
This padel racket is ideal for professional playerswho want high performance and are committed to sustainable practices. Its hybrid structure, teardrop and round, allows for versatility in the game that adapts to both defensive and attacking movements. In addition, the medium balance optimizes control without sacrificing power.
Outstanding features of the Vibor-A Dio Titan 2025:

3D glossy finish: Offers a touch of style and modernity on every shot.
12K carbon frame: Provides strength and durability to the padel racket.
Linen fiber surface: Ecological material that maintains efficiency and reduces environmental impact.
Purifying technology: Incorporates nanotechnology that helps purify the air on the court.

In conclusion, the Vibor-A Dio Titan 2025 is much more than a high performance padel racket. It is a conscious choice for players looking for quality, durability and, above all, a way to contribute to the care of the environment while enjoying a flawless game.

The VERTEX heart is responsible for distributing the forces and weights of the padel racket, reduces vibrations and torsions and increases rigidity.

The design is equally impressive, combining the black-silver of the faces with a white grip, and the heart and frame of the padel racket in shades of pink and turquoise, giving it a distinctive and attractive look on the court. In short, the Siux Trilogy 4 Control Lite Air W is a padel racket designed for demanding players looking for an exceptional balance between control and quality materials, with a highly durable construction and a design that stands out in the world of padel.

name: BULLPADEL HACK 03 2023
description:
Bullpadel Hack 03 2023, prints the maximum power
The new padel racket Bullpadel Hack 03 2023 is an ideal model for those professional or advanced level players looking for a padel racket that allows them to print the maximum power in each stroke.
It is designed for players who have adequate technical and physical preparation because, being a diamond-shaped padel racket with a high balance, the weight is distributed towards the head, so the manageability is reduced and there is more chance of injury.
The sweet spot of this padel racket is rather small and is located slightly displaced towards the head. This will favor us in the blows like the auction or other offensive blows, since it generates a lever effect that manages to exert an excellent power.
It incorporates the HESACORE grip.
In the inner core we find multieva rubber of two densities, which provides more control and more power in the ball output. For its part, in the faces of this model Bullpadel find a new carbon fiber TRICARBON. that achieves a better return of the ball and more reaction in the blow.
The CARBONTUBE frame is also made with 100% bi-directional interlocking carbon fiber. This ensures the perfect balance between control and power.
High performance with absolute control
It is a padel racket that belongs to the PRO range of Bullpadel and incorporates a METAL SHIELD protector, which grants resistance to shocks and protects the frame at a structural and superficial level.
It incorporates the VIBRADRIVE fist mounting system, which is responsible for absorbing vibrations, especially in the blows that come more off-center. To respond optimally to this type of blows, the heart of the padel racket has been reinforced with HACK technology, which provides more rigidity and firmness.
This is the official padel racket wielded by Paquito Navarro, the seventh in the World Padel Tour ranking. It is a very complete and reliable model that will allow you to stand out in the most demanding and intense matches. If you are looking for a high level game, the Bullpadel Hack 03 2023 is perfect for you.

The surface finish is sandy matte, so, in addition to achieving a more elegant aesthetic, the player will be able to hit the ball with much more spin, achieving a more versatile hit.
At the core, on the other hand, we find EVA rubber, a light, manageable and soft rubber, which guarantees excellent durability, more power in attack shots and more control in defensive plays.
In addition, the dual tube frame is made of 50% carbon and 50% fibreglass, which offers great advantages to the padel player such as optimal performance, increased rigidity and lightness, as well as excellent vibration reduction.
Maximum stability
The Spartan Revolution 2, as part of the Siux Master Series, incorporates an Anti-Torsion ShockOut system in the dies of the racket, which is responsible for reducing vibration after impact, providing stability and firmness in the hit.
In addition, it includes the Dual Pro Grip in the handle, made with FOAM rubber that guarantees a much more natural grip thanks to its minimal texture. In this way, it reduces vibration and prevents injuries such as epicondylitis or tennis elbow.

In short, the Babolat Reflex padel racket will provide you with three main advantages: manageability, power and comfort. Thanks to these benefits you will feel how your game improves with each stroke.

The Twin Tubular system has been incorporated into the double tubular frame. The carbon fabrics are imbued with resin and provide greater durability, homogeneity, and rigidity to each shot. This technology considerably improves the torsion and resistance of the racket structure.

description:

The new ML10 Limited Edition 2023 racket is an exclusive model from the new Nox collection, which has been specifically designed for advanced or professional players looking for a resistant and durable racket.
It is round with a low balance and a large, wide contact point, characteristics which provide the player with great comfort, control, and safety when hitting the ball.
Greater spin, achieving a balance between power and control
This Miguel Lamperti racket, which weighs between 360 and 375 grams, has a frame made of 100% carbon fibre, which provides the racket with greater rigidity and durability.
The faces of this Nox racket are made with 18K Carbon, a fabric which makes the racket light through the use of interwoven carbon microfilaments. This material, which is rigid and firm, stands out due to its rigidity which allows for an explosive aggressiveness.
It has an HR3 rubber core, a high-density foam that has a great memory-effect, which accelerates the recovery process to the racket’s original shape after an impact.
With a Smartstrap system to replace the strap
In terms of technologies, the Nox ML10 Limited Edition incorporates the Exclusive SPIN + system, which provides a dual rough finish that is responsible for ensuring better contact with the ball when striking it, as well as greater spin.
In addition, the frame incorporates Dynamic Composit Structure (DCS) technology, which reduces the difference in hardness between the frame and the racket’s faces. Therefore, if the player hits the ball with the outside of the racket, the risk of damage to the fibres when the rubber dips is reduced.

The high-density rubber EVA HR3CORE allows for extra power and excellent shots.
AVS technology includes the addition of small rubber inserts on the frame, which are responsible for reducing vibrations and absorbing impacts, while the innovative ROUGH SURFACE technology provides a rough, sandy texture to generate better spin. 
Additionally, this racket incorporates the new replaceable SmartsStraps system.

Thanks to its round shape you get balance and ease in the defensive game with greater control of the padel racket. And the structure of the carbon tube in 8 edges is harder to withstand the most difficult and aggressive matches.
The best elite materials for professional padel PROs.
Its surface made with Carbon Aluminazed 2 to 1 fibers are little flexible obtaining the maximum power of the padel racket for aggressive or high speed strokes. description:

This padel racket has a HACK core and NERVE channels, systems that provide rigidity, control off-center hits and reduce the weight of the padel racket. The frame is made of CARBONTUBE, a 100% bi-directional interlocking carbon.
Belongs to the PRO range
The new VIBRADRIVE system inserts an elastic rubber piece, which absorbs the vibrations produced during the game, providing more comfort and firmness when hitting.
It includes the HESACORE grip that minimizes effort, reduces injuries and vibrations, since its honeycomb design provides a larger contact surface between the fist and the hand.

name: SIUX ELECTRA ST2 CONTROL RACKET
description:
Siux Electra ST2 Control, maximum control in defense.
The Siux Electra ST2 Control is a padel racket that has been designed for those advanced or professional players looking for a padel racket that offers them a game of control, to hit firmly and safely. It is the official padel racket of the player Franco Stupaczuk.
This Siux 2023 padel racket has a round shape, with a low balance and a fairly large sweet spot. This format provides control and achieves a good level of manageability and speed of movement. The player will be more comfortable with backhand and forehand shots. 
The large sweet spot will allow the player to hit with much more precision and accuracy, while the low balance will help to achieve easy maneuverability and more control on shots. 
High quality
This Siux model, which is part of the brand's Master Series, incorporates 15K carbon in both planes. This material provides a much softer feel, adds hardness to the padel racket and increases its resistance. 
The core, on the other hand, is made of EVA Soft rubber, which provides extreme resistance and durability. It gives a harder hitting sensation and achieves a great ball exit, although it will require more strength in shots such as volleys or smashes. 
The tubular frame is made of 100% carbon fiber, which adds lightness, comfort and durability to the padel racket. Although it is mainly a control padel racket, thanks to this type of frame, which is rigid and flexible at the same time, a good balance between power and control is achieved.
Comfortable feel when hitting
The Electra ST2 Control incorporates the ShockOut anti-vibration technology in red, located in the lower dies and the Dual Grip Pro to offer a more comfortable grip throughout the game. In addition, the player will be protected against elbow, wrist and shoulder injuries.
It also incorporates Reinforced Bridge technology, which reinforces the bridge to reduce twisting and possible vibrations after impact.

A special rubber is used in the core, 3xPlay EVA. This type of rubber has a double layer. The outer layer is soft and the interior rubber has a higher density with medium hardness. This guarantees your comfort on impact, but without limiting the power you want to impart in shots.

description:

Round padel racket with a 38 mm thickness, weighing 350-365 grams. This type of padel racket is ideal for defensive players, as it allows them to play a control game. It’s a racket with a low balance and a very wide contact point, which allows for accurate and controlled shots.

The faces are made using Silver Fibreglass 3K. This fibreglass fabric has a metallic finish. It provides rigidity, but also a comfortable feel with its fine interlaced threads. It’s a flexible material which allows for good shot execution.

name: VARLION BOURNE ONE 2023
description:
Varlion Bourne One 2023, a racket to get started in the world of padel
The Varlion Bourne One padel racket has been designed with beginner players in mind who have very little experience and technique in padel. It has a diamond shape, with a medium-high balance and offers unparalleled power, especially on key shots such as the smash.
On the other hand, we observe that the Varlion Bourne One 2023 racket has a modern design, which mixes the black of the faces with the bronze colour of the frame and heart. There are also details in yellow which achieve a striking and attractive aesthetic. It belongs to the ONE range and has a weight that ranges from 345 grams to 370 grams. It is a very light and manageable racket.
Prioritise power over control
This model incorporates AERODYNAMIC DRILLING technology, a drilling system, which is responsible for eliminating vibrations after impacts, achieving a resistant and homogeneous racket. This increases the contact point of the racket, which achieves greater spin, control and power.
In addition, it includes HANDLESAFETY technology, a safety system located in the handle that achieves a more snug grip for the player, providing a 100% safe and comfortable grip. This is achieved thanks to the fact that the strap passes through the sides of the handle, and therefore is on the sides of the racket.
However, the most remarkable technology of this Varlion racket is that of the HEXAGON frame, which turns the racket into a resistant and rigid tool.
Smooth, glossy finish
The interior of the racket is composed of medium soft HYPERMEDIUM rubber foam, with a low hardness. The core is laminated with three layers of fibreglass, which have been coated with VAR-FLEX epoxy resin, which gives it greater elasticity and resistance.
The surface is made with fibreglass as the main material and offers a soft touch, as well as great spin, especially from the baseline.

The 3K carbon faces add strength and power to all attacks and returns.
The core is Black EVA Soft High Recovery  rubber. This favors a quick recovery after the most demanding volleys and tray shots.
It features a rough finish with a mesh structure on the faces, for very fast shots.
It has an anti-vibration system in the heart area, which allows for absolute cushioning of all impacts.

name: SIUX SX6
description:
Why choose the Siux SX6 racket?
The round shape of the Siux SX6 racket, with its contact point in the centre of the face, and the soft density of the EVA Soft rubber, it provides greater speed to spin shots and it is easier to hit the ball.
What type of player is the Siux SX6 racket suitable for?
The Siux SX6 racket is a versatile padel racket specifically designed for intermediate players who require manageability and total control from the start.
Design and colours
This is unique to Siux rackets. The Siux SX6 padel racket has a round shape and matte finish, as well as a blue and red heart which contrasts with the black faces and white logo.
Technical characteristics of the Siux SX6 padel racket


Made with fiber glass: it facilitates shots and increases the level of control that the player has over the ball.


Versatile: returns shots from the baseline and at the net, and offers high performance in both offensive and defensive plays.


Round shape: Provides a large contact point that makes executing shots easier.


Smooth external layer: it is not textured or rough, so it provides a harder and more powerful feel with each pass.


EVA SoftRubber: The EVA rubber in the core reduces vibrations caused by shots, which facilitates ball control.

name: SIUX INSPIRE 4.0
description:
Why will you like the Siux Inspire 4.0 racket?
The Siux Inspire 4.0 racket provides versatility during the game, thanks to its excellent features. It improves speed and provides excellent cushioning. It is one of the Siux rackets that absorbs vibrations and provides accuracy, to maintain control of the ball at all times.
What type of player is this racket intended for?
This padel racket is excellent for those who are progressing, for example, intermediate or advanced players. It is also suitable for those who want strength and power for a better shot without sacrificing accuracy.
Design and colours
This Siux racket has an inverted teardrop shape and medium balance. Its frame is made of bitubular fiber glass and has EVA soft rubber in the core. It has a black background and yellow detailing, for a classic and elegant design.
Technical characteristics of the Siux Inspire 4.0 racket


Inverted teardrop shape, and medium balance with a slightly higher contact point.


EVA Soft High Recovery Rubber, for greater ball speed and cushioning.


Matte finish for extraordinary power.


Bitubular fiber glass frame for a resistant and lightweight structure.


Helps reduce vibrations, which prevents elbow injuries.

name: SIUX VIKING III PADEL RACKET
description:
Why will you like the Siux Viking III racket?
 It is a racket that is easy to use, comfortable, accurate and very lightweight, which allows for better ball control. It is diamond-shaped, to provide a more effective shot and a higher level of power.
Who is this Siux racket for?
 The Siux racket has been specifically designed to provide the power that intermediate and advanced players need in every padel match. It also provides a high level of accuracy in every shot.
Design and colors
 This padel racket looks different from the others, as its structure and aesthetics are more fun and modern. It uses colors like vibrant green on the logo and black on the faces with a matte finish.
Technical characteristics of the Siux Viking III racket

Wide contact point, which allows less experienced players to be able to execute effective shots and with no negative results.
The EVA High Resistance rubber core helps to minimize recovery times after hitting the ball.
The quality materials with which it has been designed give it a higher level of resistance and optimize grip, along with power.
It absorbs excess vibrations, thus protecting against discomfort and reducing the risk of joint injuries.
Fiber glass that provides the faces with a higher level of resistance makes it stronger and more durable.

name: DUNLOP SPEED ELITE HL PADEL RACKET
description:
Why is the Dunlop Speed Elite HL racket appealing?
 The Dunlop Speed Elite HL racket is an ideal model for consistently improving control in your game. The shape, balance, and the technologies it incorporates are designed to provide great ball positioning capability with each stroke, to help padel players who prefer a game based on court control. You get all of this without completely forgetting about the power of the spin.
Who is this Dunlop racket for?
 This padel racket is a great option for intermediate or advanced players who focus on a controlled game.
Design and colors of this padel racket
 It has an appealing, sporty, and daring design. In a rounded shape, it has a black base paint and the Dunlop symbol in green on the faces, as well as white logos.
The racket’s technical features

Carbon fiber faces, which provide the shot with a high level of resistance and extra strength.
It has graphite in its composition to maintain the strength of the blade without affecting its weight.
Pro Touch foam core , which improves the ability to direct the ball.
Round and oversized shape , with a large contact point to control even off-center balls.
Medium balance, perfect for a controlled game while providing extra power.

name: ENEBE RSX CARBON 2021
description:
THE ENEBE RSX CARBON 21, WITH POWER IN EVERY STRIKE
The new NB RSX Carbon 21 is here to take the court by storm! Composed with the best quality materials, it is an ideal padel racket for a game loaded with versatility. With a modern and daring design, it is a very comfortable, light and manageable racket designed to give you great control and excellent power in each hit.
Player type
The ideal racket for intermediate to advanced players looking for a versatile, resistant and durable racket that provides perfect balance and excellent manageability. Manufactured in the shape of a teardrop, it has a medium balance and an estimated weight between 360-375 grams.
Features and technologies
This new and improved version of the NB RSX stands out for being made up of 100% 3K carbon, a material that offers greater resistance and durability to the racket. In addition, the faces have a matte-smooth finish, which favours spin. The EVA HR3 SOFT BLACK rubber core offers a softer touch, as well as excellent comfort, control and precision in hitting. This racket has a 38 mm profile and features a Shockout undergrip.
Design and colours
It is an elegant racket with a black structure. The faces feature the NB details in red, which stand out at first glance. It is a modern racket that is perfect for the most demanding players.

name: ORANGE HEAD CALIBRE
description:
Why will you like the Head Calibre racket so much?
The Head Calibre racket is perfect for starting out in the world of padel, providing a good performance and helping players find their playing style. Thanks to its design, it adapts very well to users.
What type of player is the Head Calibre racket for?
The Head Calibre padel racket is designed for players who are new to the world of padel, and who are looking for the best experience on the court with extra help to perform well and find their playing style. It is a versatile padel racket that offers an excellent balance between control and strength.
Head Calibre racket design and colours
The Head Calibre racket is designed predominantly in black and orange. It is designed in a teardrop shape.
Technical characteristics of the Head Calibre racket

Balance: It has a medium balance that gives the player good versatility for executing both powerful and accurate shots.
Frame: Made of carbon and fiber glass on the faces. It is made with quality materials that make it highly resistant.
Core: Contains EVA rubber, which provides a softer feel that absorbs shocks and provides stability.
Performance: It promotes high performance on the court, as well as increased strength for hitting the ball.
Manageability: It provides great manageability thanks to its design, which provides more accuracy to execute shots and ball spin effectively.

name: BULLPADEL IONIC POWER 2022
description:
BULLPADEL IONIC POWER 2022, INCREDIBLE POWER
One of the big surprises that Bullpadel brings for this 2022, is the new Bullpadel Iconic Power 2022, a power racket that stands out for its incredible design and structure composed of 100% carbon.
It is a padel racket designed to give you excellent sensations in the game, in addition to the best features, great performance and the best power in each stroke.
Type of player
The Bullpadel iconic power is a padel racket designed for advanced level players looking for a padel racket loaded with power without completely giving up control.
Built in a diamond mold, it has a medium balance and superior sweet spot, in addition to a light weight that favors manageability.
Features and technologies
It has an Eva rubber core. Its frame and face are made of carbon which increases the rigidity of the structure, power and durability of the padel racket.
It wasmanufactured with a mixture of carbon fiber and fiberglass in the outer core, with the CarbomTube frame of 100% carbon fiber, in addition to the XForce system.
Design and colors
This padel racket is one of the most elegant of the new season, with a diamond-shaped structure , it combines a beautiful green color that combines with the black to highlight the elegance and luxury of the model.

name: BULLPADEL AXYM DB 2022
description:
Why you will love the Bullpadel AXYM DB 2022 padel racket?
This new Bullpadel padel racket design is ideal for players looking for comfort, lightness and balance. It has a teardrop-shaped structure and a medium balance, which provides a versatile playing style. It has an AXYM heart.
What type of player is the Bullpadel AXYM DB 2022 padel racket aimed at?
Bullpadel padel racquets have been created for intermediate or advanced players. They provide balance, power and maximum control during matches that require concentration and a highly competitive level. They are comfortable and have a large sweet spot.
Design and colors
This padel racket has an attractive red and silver design. The brand's logo appears on both sides and stands out against the background.
Technical features of the Bullpadel AXYM DB 2022 padel racket

Carbon Flex Technology (carbon and fiberglass) in the planes to achieve greater power.
Multi EVA rubber inner core that is more elastic and offers a better feel and ball exit control.
3DGrain surface, which provides a rough surface that improves efficiency and precision in hitting.
AXYM core for excellent aerodynamics . It eliminates most of the vibrations and achieves a comfortable handling.
Its design favors a better distribution of energy with much less effort, improving playability.

name: BULLPADEL VERTEX JUNIOR BOY 2022
description:
THE BULLPADEL VERTEX JUNIOR BOY 2022, IN THE NEW 2022 COLLECTION
The Bullpadel Vertex Junior Boy 2022 padel racket stands out for its performance and its lightness. It has a design that allows for greater strength in the game.
Why choose the Bullpadel Vertex Junior Boy 2022 padel racket?
The Bullpadel Vertex Junior Boy padel racket is a model that adapts to junior players. It has a very elegant and professional aesthetic. Its fibreglass faces improve hitting strength and provide extra precision. It offers high playability and stability.
Who is the Bullpadel Vertex Junior Boy 2022 padel racket for?
This Bullpadel padel racket is designed for intermediate junior players who are looking for a high-performance model that allows them to take their game to another level.
Design and colours
This Bullpadel padel racket has a design that is very similar to its adult version. It has a diamond shape that is painted black. In addition, it features details of the Bullpadel brand in orange throughout the racket.
Technical characteristics of the Bullpadel Vertex Junior Boy 2022 padel racket

Top quality materials have been used in its manufacture. This allows the racket to provide high performance on the court.
Its inner core is made of EVA soft rubber, so it better absorbs vibrations, offering greater comfort in the game.
Provides greater strength during shots. In this way, you can play a more intense game.
It has a medium balance, which provides greater manageability and better control during the game.
Its frame is made of carbon, a very light and highly resistant material. Therefore, this racket adapts to the most demanding conditions.

name: VIBOR-A BLACKHEAD CARBON 2022 PADEL RACKET
description:
Why choose the Vibor-A Blackhead Carbon 2022  padel racket?
 The Vibor-A Blackhead Carbon 2022 padel racket has medium balance and a very wide central contact point thanks to its teardrop shape. Therefore, it provides an excellent performance through accurate and powerful shots.
Who is the Vibor-A Blackhead Carbon 2022 padel racket for?
 The new Vibor-A Blackhead Carbon 2022 racket is specifically designed for advanced players looking for a balanced game between attack and defense.
Design and colors
 These Vibor-A rackets have an equally classic and sporty look. The predominantly black color contrasts with the silver heart. In addition, the red detailing gives it a bold touch.
Technical characteristics of the Vibor-A Blackhead Carbon 2022  padel racket


 Teardrop shape: The medium balance and very wide central contact point provides excellent performance when executing accurate and powerful shots.


 Carbon fiber: The carbon fiber frame and faces ensure excellent strength, durability and power when hitting the ball.


 Black EVA Soft rubber : The EVA rubber core provides a comfortable feel, generates better spin and absorbs vibration.


 High performance: Thanks to the excellent materials with which it is made and its design, this racket’s performance is suitable for high-level players.


 Greater power: Its contact point that corrects off-center balls, together with its shape that provides medium balance, improve power at the net.

name: STARVIE AQUILA SPACE SPEED 2.0 2023
description: The StarVie Aquila Space Speed 2.0 2023 is the perfect padel racket to play with versatility and speed The StarVie Aquila Space Speed 2.0 2023, for all types of shots. If you are a mid-level player who plays both powerful and controlled shots, this is the racket for you. A teardrop-shaped padel racket with a medium balance and contact point. A racket with which you’ll always win and improve. A soft padel racket to play with control and rebound when hitting the ball This racket has a solid and strong structure, made with tubular carbon technology. The tubular Extreme Spot technology makes the racket’s contact point wider. The racket’s faces are made with 3K carbon, a flexible material for a soft feel when hitting the ball. It helps you to play with control. The racket’s core incorporates EVA Ultra Speed Soft rubber,  a fairly low-density rubber. It allows for control, as well as rebound speed and spin. The faces with a rough finish improve ball contact and spin. Practice handling the ball and testing the speed you can get in your shots. StarVie racket made in Spain, both durable and resistant This racket has an insert in the heart to improve weight distribution and the controlled use of the racket (Aquila Core). Use a racket made in Spain. This is the perfect racket for offensive players due to its resistance and durability. The racket weighs between 350-385 grams. Its design blends in a gradient from green to blue on the body of the racket, with the frame and the handle in black. Buy a StarVie 2023 racket for optimal performance in the new season.

name: WILSON BELA ELITE V2 RED
description: Wilson Bela Pro V2, the official racket of professional player Fernando Belasteguín The Wilson Bela Pro V2 is the official padel racket of Fernando Belasteguín, a professional padel player ranked number 5 on the World Padel Tour circuit. This padel racket is ideal for a versatile game including attacking and defensive moves. This padel racket has a diamond-shaped body with a high balance for attacking shots. With a wider contact point to deliver powerful shots, designed at the request of Fernando Belasteguín. It is made with a Firm EVA rubber core to help deliver power in shots. The racket’s profile is 38 mm and it weighs around 370 grams. This racket is robust, to help deliver powerful shots The frame is made with premium quality carbon, combined with 3K carbon fibre faces. The faces made with this carbon have a slightly soft feel to compensate for the harder core, made with Firm EVA rubber. It is a resistant and strong padel racket for executing powerful shots. The frame is solid and durable. The softer faces allow shots to be slightly cushioned for better control of power. The firmness of the core allows you to execute shots with energy, allowing you to attack with power. Clean and powerful shots thanks to its rigid EVA rubber The Wilson racket has textured surface for better grip and spin With SpinEffect technology, a rough, textured surface to improve spin shots by improving ball contact. And Sharp Hole technology, for a better grip in every shot due to the perforations in the design The racket has a removable and customisable strap. This racket has a striking and unique design with the body completely in red and a black grip. Why wait for your new Wilson racket?

name: PRINCE ROCKET BLACK TATTOO
description:
Why buy the Prince Rocket Black Tattoo padel racket?
This padel racket has a round shape and a low-medium balance. It is very easy to use, thanks to its very wide contact point and hole pattern that is distributed across the majority of the faces.
What type of player is it designed for?
It is for adult padel players who need a light and very easy-to-use racket, which allows for optimal contact with the ball in all serves.
Design and colours
The faces are designed with contrasting, multidimensional motifs in black and white. In the centre, they include a very large, stylized P for Prince in bright red. On the lower left of both faces it includes the words Prince By Hydrogen.
Technical characteristics of the Prince Rocket Black Tattoo padel racket

The frame is made with CarbonTech technology, which makes it resistant to damage due to rough treatment and frequent impacts against walls.
The faces have a textured ESF finish, which allows for the execution of spin shots which are very difficult for rivals to return.
The core is made of ultra-soft EVA rubber which completely dampens the effects of vibrations to prevent muscle and joint injuries. It allows for very fast recovery.
It also incorporates the Power Flex Fiber system, which makes it very flexible. Ideal for executing very precise returns.
The heart has a very wide, triangular hole which facilitates the execution of very wide swings, completely free from interference.

name: VARLION BOURNE PRISMA AIRFLOW W LIMA 2023
description:
Bourne Prisma Airflow W 2023 racket, winter version
As part of the 2023 collection, the new Varlion Bourne Prisma Airflow W racket has arrived, a model from the premium range, ideal for a game that focuses mainly on power.
It is a padel racket designed for professional level players since it has a diamond shape with a high balance. This shape has a reduced contact point and is slightly displaced towards the head. It offers you exceptional power on offensive shots like the smash.
Increases the spin on the ball
The core of this Varlion model is HYPERSOFT, a foam rubber with medium hardness, which offers balanced control and power, as well as very good spin. This rubber is softer and it is recommended to use it in temperatures below 25ºC.
12K carbon fibre is the main material used in the manufacture of the outer part of this men’s padel racket. This fabric (7 RHOMBUS CARBON FABRIC) has a rhomboid shape and provides flexibility to the core. 
In the Bourne Prisma Airflow by Varlion we find a prism frame, which resists the wind 10% less, offers great handling and more speed of play and movement of the racket. This frame, which is more rigid and resistant, has an adhesive protectorattached to it, which eliminates vibrations and absorbs shocks and abrasions.
Innovation and high performance technologies
What’s more, this racket includes DIFFUSOR WINGS technology, which guarantees more control when hitting thanks to the elimination of vibrations, more speed and a more consistent and regular ball trajectory.
The SLICE technology provides roughness to the faces of this racket, achieving more spin in the shots since the ball grips the surface more easily. It is a technology that has been designed especially with drive shots with slices or backhand shots in mind.

name: VARLION BOURNE PRISMA RADIO W BLUE 2023
description:
Varlion Bourne Prisma Radio W, a premium racket
The new Bourne Prisma Radio W 2023 racket belongs to Varlion's Premium range. It has a diamond shape with high balance, ideal for those players with a professional level looking for extreme power but without giving up control.
The exterior of this racket is made up of 7 RHOMBUS CARBON FABRIC, a 12K carbon fibre fabric, which gives it great flexibility and a softer feel. The winter version of the Bourne Prisma Radio W incorporates materials with greater mechanical elasticity so that, when temperatures are below 25ºC, you can perform well on the court.
The surface has a rough texture, which allows for a better grip on the ball and, therefore, it will be able to achieve more spin and surprise the opponent more easily.
The core, meanwhile, is made of HYPERSOFT foam rubber of medium hardness, which provides exceptional rebounding and a balance between power and control.
The frame of the Bourne Prisma Radio W has been designed in the shape of a prism and offers the player great handling and speed, as well as greater velocity of play and movement of the racket.
Take your game to the next level
This Varlion model incorporates a wide variety of technologies that make it a complete and high-performance racket.
Among them we can highlight one of the most important, RADIO, a very innovative technology that has revolutionised the manufacturing process of padel rackets. This is so because the racket comes out of its own mould, so the core is much more resistant and the use of fabrics has been reduced by 50%.
We also find AIRFLOW technology, which focuses on providing airflow through a special arrangement of elongated, circular holes located in the centre of the core and around the frame. This helps the player to get much more power in each shot.
